subject: Finances
Football
lead_paragraph: Art Rooney II, the Pittsburgh Steelers’ president, said he and his father, Dan Rooney, were looking for additional partners. The Rooneys are seeking investors so they can buy shares from Dan Rooney’s brothers that would separate the Steelers from the family’s interest in racetrack casino operations and satisfy N.F.L. rules regarding ownership equity. Art Rooney said that one potential investor had been approved by the N.F.L.’s finance committee and that the others would go before the committee as part of ownership meetings next week in California. Three partners were added last year: the Hollywood producer Thomas Tull, the Tennessee businessman James Haslam III and the Paul family of Pittsburgh. steelers.
